thread.title: CBS, Redstone brawl escalates into corporate warfare

title: CBS, Redstone brawl escalates into corporate warfare
text:
CBS, Redstone brawl escalates into corporate warfare Friday, May 18, 2018 - 01:57
The plot thickened surrounding the battle between the CBS board of directors and the media company's majority shareholder Shari Redstone as the board voted to slash her voting power and canceled its annual shareholder meeting. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The plot thickened surrounding the battle between the CBS board of directors and the media company's majority shareholder Shari Redstone as the board voted to slash her voting power and canceled its annual shareholder meeting.
